subject: Attn Sir From BB&t Bank, Pls get back to us Urgent
body:
Attention Raymond Petit

Be informed that we have receive your information in our office, right now
I am a Director,international Remittance BB&t Bank,this fund is your
compensation fund from United Nation Poverty Alleviation, they want to
compensate all the people who lost their funds in the Covid 19 virus right
now the fund has deposited in our official Bank account been BB&T BANK and
is in escrow account and we need all your information including your
address, and telephone number to enable the fund  to wire to your account,
Pls kindly get back to us to enable us to process all the Legal documents,
including your I.D CARD

This number 909) 353-4376 is for sms only
3645 Mary Lou Ln S
Ontario, Ohio 44906

Yours faithfully,

Mr. Mark Carney


Attention Raymond Petit

This to inform you that we acknowledge the receipt of your e-mail regarding
all what you said concerning your experience in the past for not receive
your compensation fund, now this your really compensation, it does not
related to anything scam or fake, we are not dealing such a thing here in
United State but one thing you have to do for us to make sure that you
supported us a Little, so that we can be able to obtain all the Legal
document/ fund release order document of which it worth about 20 pages of
official hard document and also as soon as all the Legal document is ready,
it will be send to you through FedEx courier company for you sign as the
beneficiary of the fund because we
have already go through you file, we discovered  that you have not been
able to receive all the Legal document for over the years that is why you
have not been able to receive your fund in any where because  some people
will not tell you the really truth of this your fund transaction, Pls as
soon as all the Legal document is obtained and you receive it through FedEx
courier company then you sign as the beneficiary of the fund of $8.5Million
dollars, we give you %100 full Guarantee that you will receive your
compensation fund of $8.5Million
dollars through electronic fund transfer to your account, kindly reconfirm
your full address and full name to enable us to precede, we
are waiting for your response


Yours faithfully,

Mr. Mark Carney



yu36214@***.com
Hello Markham,

Thank you for your message. I'm thrilled to hear about this! Could you
please provide me with more details? How was my name selected for this? And
could you also explain the process of how these funds will be delivered to
me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.
Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: Attn Sir From BB&t Bank, Pls get back to us Urgent
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Carney,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting news! I'm a bit surprised, but also very grateful. Could you please explain how my name was chosen for this compensation? Also, could you walk me through the process of how these funds will be transferred to me?

I eagerly await your response.

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: Attn Sir From BB&t Bank, Pls get back to us Urgent
body:
Thank you for your update, we are going to send you e-mail by tomorrow as
soon as possible

subject: Re: Attn Sir From BB&t Bank, Pls get back to us Urgent
body:
Hello Stacey,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm glad to hear that you're interested in this process. Your name was selected through a random computer ballot system drawn from over 20,000 company and 30,000,000 individual email addresses and names from all over the world.

As for the process of delivering these funds to you, it's quite simple. Once we have confirmed your details, we will proceed with the necessary paperwork to release the funds. After that, the funds will be transferred electronically to your bank account.

However, before we can proceed further, could you please confirm if you have any existing bank account? Please note that we do not need any specific details about your bank account at this stage.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Stacey

subject: Re: Attn Sir From BB&t Bank, Pls get back to us Urgent
body:
Hello there! 

Thank you so much for your update. I'm really looking forward to receiving it by tomorrow. Could you possibly give me a rough estimate of what time I should expect it? And is there anything else I need to do or prepare in the meantime?

Best wishes,
Stacey
